title: turn off autoplay (firefox)
content:
hi all,

i can't afford much data

it seems like more websites are autoplaying videos

can someone please tell me how to turn off autoplay in firefox 116.02

i went into firefox permissions and turned off autoplay and it didn't work :(

please see below, i turned off those 2 items, but they keep coming back

thx
creator: at-the-space

title: Why the hell copy and paste stop work from nothing?
content:
Firefox simple do not paste on webwhatsapp any more.

I'd tried EVERYTHING!!!!!!!!!!

Disable addons, run it in safe mode, clean install AND NOTHING!

If i go to dom.event.clipboardevents.enable and set it to false, it works for texts AND STOP TO WORK FOR IMAGES! What the HELL IS THAT?

I've look for some solution in web and found THE SAME ISSUE FROM LIKE 10 YEARS AGO AND NO SOLUTION FOR THIS AT ALL.

Don't you guys don't solve a simple copy and paste problem that affects the browser for 10 YEARS????????????????????????????????????????

Stop make people do some called "tweaks" to solve a simple task as copy and paste things, and screw other simple tasks like COPY AND PASTE A SIMPLE IMAGE!

It's 2023, for God sake!

Solve this! My life is your freaking browser!
creator: freitasabreu

title: CAN'T COPY PASTE ON WHATSAPP WEB

title: Atalhos de teclado

title: Firefox for Mac OS, iPad etc
content:
I am having Mac desktop browsing problems with Firefox - clicking is slow and sometime unresponsive, or erratic - and none of that with Safari. It's not hardware or bandwidth... is it a buggy new update, or maybe Apple shenanigans? I am actually asking that because my iPad Firefox browser started being buggy too - it's not opening cached pages Thanks for the help!

Firefox 116.0.2 Monterey 12.1
creator: marino3

title: whatsapp copy paste not working
content:
Today, the function of copying and pasting a simple text from the notepad in the WhatsApp Web chat has become a nightmare.

I have tried with the "control + V" key, "control shift + V" and with the copy/paste tool in the bookmarks bar and none of them work.

I have also tried restarting Fireforx in troubleshooting mode and restarting the computer and this option does not work either.

I should also mention that when entering my bank's password field, I am unable to paste my password. IMPORTANT NOTE:

If I enter with Google Chrome, then if I can copy and paste.

My Firefox version is 115.1.0esr (64-bit)

Thank you.
creator: Estepario
